title: Neutrophil-Lymphocyte Ratio (NLR) Calculator
desc: The Neutrophil-Lymphocyte Ratio (NLR) Calculator calculates neutrophil-lymphocyte ratio.

orgreference.text: Zahorec R. Ratio of Neutrophil to Lymphocyte Counts--Rapid and Simple Parameter of Systemic Inflammation and Stress in Critically Ill.Bratisl Lek Listy. 2001;102(1):5-14.

data.evidence:
Neutrophil-lymphocyte ratio (NLR) = (Absolute neutrophil count, cells/μL) / (Absolute lymphocyte count, cells/μL)

Note: Neutrophil and lymphocyte can also be entered as percentages.
data.facts:
Neutrophil-lymphocyte ratio Physiologic stress level
1-3 Normal
4-5 -
6-8 Mild
9-18 Moderate
>18 Severe

From PulmCrit: Neutrophil-Lymphocyte Ratio (2019).
